summary: An email from an individual (likely a law enforcement agent or prosecutor) to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York requesting assistance in obtaining an official passport for upcoming international trips to conduct witness interviews in the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: EFTA00096265
persons.context: The individual is requesting an official passport for international travel to conduct witness interviews related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Request for Official Passport
events.description: An investigator emails the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to request an official passport for upcoming international travel to conduct witness interviews in the Epstein investigation.

keyFacts: As of January 2020, the Epstein investigation involved international witness interviews requiring official travel.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) was involved in coordinating this investigative travel.
The document indicates ongoing investigative activity in the Epstein case at the beginning of 2020.
